Actions.Text:
set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"
tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"
	set appName to getvariable "localAppName" instance kmInst
end tell
set appPath to POSIX path of (path to application appName)
return text 1 thru -2 of appPath

Actions.Title: Double Check the Variables
Actions.Text:
The App Name: %localAppName%
The App Path: %localAppPath%
The App Bundle: %localAppBundle%
